articles.title: Kianna Underwood, Former Nickelodeon Child Star, Dies at 33 After NYC Hit and Run - Yahoo News Canada
articles.description: Kianna Underwood, a former child star known for her work on Nickelodeon, has died following a hit and run in New York City. She was 33.

articles.description: Pamela Anderson did not like seeing Seth Rogen at the Golden Globes, after he starred in and produced the miniseries ‘Pam & Tommy.’ ‘Eventually, hopefully, he will reach out to me to apologize,’ she said.
